message.name: ERR_INSRETHEADER_FV_RECEIPT_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: You must enter a receipt date for this Employer Return.

message.name: INF_INSRETHEADER_COMPL
message.locale: The insurance return is valid and the status is set to complete.

message.name: INF_INSRETHEADER_EMPLOYEECONTRIBAMT
message.locale: The employee contribution amount of the Line Items does not match the employee contribution amount on the Header.

message.name: INF_INSRETHEADER_EMPLOYERCONTRIBAMT
message.locale: The employer contribution amount of the Line Items does not match the employer contribution amount on the Header.

message.name: INF_INSRETHEADER_INCOMPL
message.locale: The sum of the line item totals do not match the totals on the Header and the return is not valid.

message.name: INF_INSRETHEADER_NUMCASUALEMPLOYEES
message.locale: The number of line items entered for casual employees does not match the number of casual employees specified on the insurance return header

message.name: INF_INSRETHEADER_NUMPERMANENTEMPLOYEES
message.locale: The number of line items entered for permanent employees does not match the number of permanent employees specified on the insurance return header

message.name: INF_INSRETHEADER_TOTALPAYROLL
message.locale: The sum of the income amounts of the Line Items does not match the total payroll amount specified on the insurance return header.

message.name: INF_INSRETHEADER_TOTCONTRIBAMT
message.locale: The total contribution amount of the Line Items does not match the total contribution amount on the Header.

message.name: INF_INSRETHEADER_TOTCONTRIBAMTS
message.locale: The system was unable to reconcile the insurance line items and the return details.

message.name: INF_INSRETHEADER_TOTNUMEMPLOYEES
message.locale: The number of line items entered does not match the number specified on the insurance return header.

message.name: ERR_INSRETHEADER_XFV_INSRETPERIOD_MODIFIED
message.locale: Insurance return period must not be modified.
